yaml.title: Interesting Implementations
yaml.abstract: These are code snippets of various mathematical problems and numerical methods in Python and R that I found interesting while browsing through the internet and going through various books which don't exactly fall into a specific category per se.

markdown.markdown:
```{python3}
import numpy as np

a = np.random.randn(3,3)
b = np.random.randn(3,1)
c = a*b





print (a)
print(b)
print(c)

```
